text: Harold Elwin "Bo" Bice, Jr (born November 1, 1975) is an American singer. He was a runner-up on American Idol. In 2003, Bice was arrested for possession of marijuana, drug paraphernalia and public intoxication. He avoided jail time by agreeing to enter a drug program.100 Celebrities Arrested For Drug Possession from PopCrunch.com"Idol" Finalist Dodged Cocaine, Pot Raps from The Smoking Gun'Idol' Singer Bo Bice Has Drug Rap Sheet, Court Papers Show from MTV.com ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Country musicians from Alabama Category:Southern rock musicians Category:American rock guitarists Category:American Idol contestants Category:Living people Category:1975 births Category:Singers from Huntsville, Alabama Category:Musicians from Huntsville, Alabama
title: Bo Bice
